data.title: The weather in April in Russia
data.meta_description: The average weather for the month of April in Russia. Read about the average temperatures and rainfall in Russia for April.
data.text:
Normal weather for Russia in April

It's cool in April in Russia with an average temperature of 11°C. Temperatures this month range from a low of 5°C to a high of 16°C. At night, you can expect temperatures between -1°C and 6°C.

In April, there is an average of 42 mm of precipitation, spread over 11 days days. Of the total precipitation, about 3,0 cm falls as snow in April. The wind speed is around 4 Bft, mostly coming from the South.

The UV index is a maximum of 5 this month. That's a moderate value on the intensity scale of 1 to 11. Unprotected skin can burn in about 30 minutes.

The highest recorded temperature on April in recent years was 25°C in 2015. The lowest daytime temperature on this day was -2°C in 2020. The extreme night temperatures ranged from a low of -16°C to a high of 13°C.

Daily Temperature in April in Russia

This chart shows the average daily high temperatures in April in Russia, measured in degrees Celsius. The bottom of the chart shows the days of April. Based on historical data, it shows the average daily temperatures for this month.

Daily Rainfall in April in Russia

This chart shows the average daily rainfall in April for Russia, measured in millimetres over the past years. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it’s snow or hail. The bottom of the chart shows the days of April. Based on historical data, this chart gives an idea of how much rain you can expect each day.

Daily Snowfall in April in Russia

This chart shows the average daily snowfall in April in Russia, measured in centimetres. The bottom of the chart shows the days of the month. The data is based on historical measurements and gives an idea of the average snowfall in April.

Daily UV Index in April in Russia

This chart shows the average daily UV index in April in Russia, with the UV index ranging from 0 to a maximum of 11. The bottom of the chart shows the days of the month. Based on historical data, this chart provides an idea of the daily UV radiation levels you can expect.

Temperature in April in Russia Over the Years

This chart shows the average temperature in April in Russia, measured in degrees Celsius, over the past years.

Total Rainfall in April in Russia Over the Years

This chart shows the average rainfall in April in Russia, measured in millimetres over the past years. Rainfall is always measured as water, even if it’s snow or hail.
